designSystem.name: Panshibi Memecoin Design System
designSystem.description: A design system for the Panshibi memecoin project, focusing on a playful, engaging, and community-centric visual identity.

sections.name: Header
sections.description: Sticky header containing the logo, navigation links, and a 'Connect Wallet' button.

sections.name: Hero
sections.description: Main section featuring animated characters, a prominent headline, and a presale call-to-action card.

sections.name: Featured In
sections.description: A section to display logos of publications or partners.

sections.name: About/Unleashed
sections.description: Introduction to the Panshibi project with bold text and character illustrations.

sections.name: Press
sections.description: A visually engaging section with quotes and character art.

sections.name: Exchange Wishlist
sections.description: A section outlining the target exchanges for listing.

sections.name: Giveaway
sections.description: A promotional section for a giveaway.

sections.name: How to Buy
sections.description: A step-by-step guide on how to purchase the token.

sections.name: Tokenomics
sections.description: A section detailing the token distribution with a donut chart.

sections.name: Meet the Team
sections.description: Introduces the core team members with character avatars.

sections.name: Roadmap
sections.description: A timeline of the project's future plans.

sections.name: FAQ
sections.description: An accordion-style section for frequently asked questions.

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Contains social media links and legal disclaimers.

characterDesign.style: 2D cartoon with thick outlines and expressive features.

mainCharacters.name: Ping Ping
mainCharacters.description: A larger, more traditional panda figure.

characterDesign.colorScheme: Primarily black and white for the pandas, with vibrant colors used for clothing and accessories to denote personality.

designStyle.overall: A playful and chaotic 'meme' aesthetic, balanced with clean, modern UI components for usability.
designStyle.iconography: Custom icons with a hand-drawn feel, often incorporating the panda motif.
designStyle.illustrations: Character-driven illustrations are central to the brand's narrative and visual appeal.
designStyle.animations: Subtle animations on buttons and interactive elements to enhance user experience. More prominent animations are used for character introductions and storytelling.
